minecraft:lore: A Guide to the arcane arts

pages.text: Behold, the ancient guide to ascend as a TRUE Mage. The path is arduous and shrouded in mystery, yet in time thou shalt master its secrets.
First, thou must forge thine initial wand — for this sacred tool, gather thee three wooden rods.

§l§6The Path of the Mage§r

Ascend as a TRUE Mage by mastering the arts of enchanting, spellcrafting, and discovery. With each step, thy magickal prowess shall grow.

§l§6Gaining Mage Levels§r

Enchanting items grants thee fixed magick experience. Learning new spells from spell books varies with the rarity: common spells grant little, while epic spells bestow great experience.

§l§6Forging Spells§r

Creating spells requires experience levels. The higher the cost to craft a spell, the greater the magick experience gained. Choose thy arcane path wisely.

§l§6Wands: Tools of the Arcane§r

Seven wands exist for crafting: wood, stone, iron, gold, diamond, emerald, and netherite. The rarer the material, the greater the discount when casting spells and the more powerful spells may be crafted.

§l§7Wooden Wand§r — A simple beginning. High magick cost, limited power.

§l§8Stone Wand§r — Modest upgrade, slight magick cost reduction.

§l§fIron Wand§r — Balanced power and efficiency.

§l§6Golden Wand§r — Fragile yet greatly reduces magick cost.

§l§bDiamond Wand§r — Potent and efficient, ideal for experienced mages.

§l§aEmerald Wand§r — Rare and versatile, enhancing spell potency further.
§l§5Netherite Wand§r — Supreme among all wands: minimal magick cost and unmatched spell strength.

§l§6Magick Enhancements§r

Enchant thy gear with magickal upgrades: increase your maximum magick or enhance your magick regeneration. These enchantments are vital for mastering advanced spells.

§l§6Spell Books§r

Discover spell books in dungeons, abandoned mineshafts, Nether fortresses, Bastions, End Cities, and the Deep Dark. The harder the place to reach, the rarer and more powerful the spell.

§l§6Expanding Spellcraft§r

As thy Mage Level increases, thou canst weave more effects into a spell. Up to 4 effects may be bound into a single spell once thou reachest level 60.

§l§6Casting Spells§r

Crouch to cast a spell upon thyself. Otherwise, the spell becomes a projectile, delivering its power upon the target it strikes.

§l§6Final Counsel§r

Balance thy magick. Conserve energy for moments of dire need, and let wisdom guide thy incantations.

§l§2May the Threads of Magick forever weave through thy soul, brave Mage.§r

§oThis tome shall serve as thine guide on the mystic path...
